thread.title: BRIEF-Nemaska Lithium And Northvolt Announce Signature Of Agreement In Principle For Supply Of Lithium Hydroxide

title: BRIEF-Nemaska Lithium And Northvolt Announce Signature Of Agreement In Principle For Supply Of Lithium Hydroxide
text:
April 27, 2018 / 8:51 AM / Updated 40 minutes ago BRIEF-Nemaska Lithium And Northvolt Announce Signature Of Agreement In Principle For Supply Of Lithium Hydroxide Reuters Staff
April 27 (Reuters) - Nemaska Lithium Inc:
* NEMASKA LITHIUM AND NORTHVOLT ANNOUNCE SIGNATURE OF AGREEMENT IN PRINCIPLE FOR SUPPLY OF LITHIUM HYDROXIDE
* NEMASKA LITHIUM - UNDER AGREEMENT, CO AGREED TO SUPPLY TO NORTHVOLT, UP TO 5,000 BUT NOT LESS THAN 3,500 METRIC TONNES PER YEAR OF LITHIUM HYDROXIDE
* NORTHVOLT HAS AGREED TO DELIVER TO CORPORATION A EUR 10M PROMISSORY NOTE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
